channel.title: How to get Coordinates to show up?
channel.description: Hey everyone, I'm using Richscape as a starting source for my server, and I want to change the starting point for new characters, how do I found out the Coordinates?

item.title: How to get Coordinates to show up?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Create a command to debug them, or you can use a client-side command for them.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get Coordinates to show up?

item.title: How to get Coordinates to show up?
item.dc:creator: @da_pimp da pimp
item.description:
@da_pimp wrote:

search for wat i sad, and change the x,y coords that the game sez

lijke this

    // initial x and y coordinates of the player
    heightLevel = 0;
    // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
    teleportToX = ####
    teleportToY = ####

change the ####'s to the coords

Read full topic
item.source: How to get Coordinates to show up?

item.title: How to get Coordinates to show up?

@baez9 wrote:

Mm, to get the coords u want, go to the place you want and type ::mypos and it should say it.

change em there

aND THE COORDS shud b in the tools section
